text: The men's 100 metres event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 20 and 21 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Deji Aliu ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jason Gardener ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Deworski Odom ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 July Wind: +1.2 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
